attributes.action: Impose a sentance of a minimum 2 years in prision for possesion of a knife in a public place.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We have a duty to contribute to the goal of deterring knife offending. Through any means possible.

Figures obtained under the freedom of information act show that there is a knife crime committed in the UK every 24 minutes! 

- in fact the figures show that there have been 5,500 serious knife crimes in the UK in just 3 months.

46% of 15-17 year olds admitting to carrying knives for self defense 
(Ian Johnston - Chief Constable British Transport Police)

27% of all murders are by sharp implement (Recorded Crime Statistics)

62% of excluded school children carry a knife! .. (Youth Justice Board / Mori 2003)

We, the undersigned demand protection for us, our children and families.
 
Threats of violence with a knife should carry a 5 year mandatory sentence for those over the age of 13

For those under the age of 13, a one year custodial sentence in a young offenders institute or similar.

Using a knife in whatever form 10 years including robbery or street violence for the over 13s.

For the under 13's, 2 years custodial sentence in a young offenders institute or similar.

Murder / Manslaughter - Life of which 15 years must be served without parole.

Protect us.
